thread.title: EATEL Introduces ZoneIQ Business Automation and Security Service
thread.title_full: EATEL Introduces ZoneIQ Business Automation and Security Service

author: admin
title: EATEL Introduces ZoneIQ Business Automation and Security Service
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 3:30 AM   EATEL 
GONZALES, LA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/03/15 -- EATEL announced today its ZoneIQ business automation and security service for the office. As an extension of the company's HomeIQ service, the Internet-based security system enables business owners to conveniently monitor and control vital office functions while receiving alerts on specific activities status -- from any mobile device. 
Offered as part of EATEL's communication services, ZoneIQ combines the latest in smart business automation solutions with state-of-the-art security equipment monitored 24/7. The new security service provides business owners with the flexibility to remotely adjust lighting and temperature conditions as well as property and intrusion protection -- from a single website or app. Customizable packages include advanced control panels, smart door locks, infrared cameras, motion detectors and image sensors, remotely adjustable thermostats and other office environmental detection devices. 
Backed by more than 80 years of proven customer service, EATEL'S latest advanced offering brings business owners peace-of-mind, time savings, and increased quality-of-life at and away from the office, enabling them to: Alarm and disarm the system from any mobile device. Receive alarm notifications by text or email. Remotely control office environmental conditions. Lock or unlock office doors via the smartphone app. View designated areas over smartphones or tablets. Receive video clips of anyone entering the office area outside of business hours. 
"With ZoneIQ, EATEL is helping local business owners secure their most vital assets from the palm of their hands," said Scott Thompson, EATEL's President. "Using state-of-the-art security and monitoring equipment, we continue to pioneer advanced cloud-based services." 
ZoneIQ is sold separately or offered as a bundled discount with existing business phone, Internet and TV services. Service plans start as low as $24.95. For more details please visit, eatel.com/ZoneIQ or call (225) 621-4300. 
About EATEL EATEL was the first company in Louisiana to provide TV, Internet, and telephone services over an all-fiber network that offers a broad array of integrated digital services. In 2015, EATEL launched its newest service, "HomeIQ," the smarter security and home automation service that allows customers to connect with their homes quickly, conveniently and from anywhere. Founded in 1935, EATEL is currently celebrating 80 years of service as a business leader and the premiere telecommunications provider in Ascension, Livingston and East Baton Rouge Parishes. To learn more about EATEL, please visit www.eatel.com . Contact:
